name: Leah Adler
summary: Two years of experience as a fine jewelry CAD designer and seven years as an illustrator jewelry designer; founder and lead designer of Z LIU Design. Certified in Matrix 8 and T-Splines; proficient in Matrix CAD/CAM, Adobe Creative Suite, and Microsoft Office. Strong attention to detail and organizational skills. Bachelor of Fine Arts and Audio-Visual Editing.

experience.title: Fine Jewelry CAD Designer
experience.description: Create original and complex CAD designs for stock and Neiman Marcus.

experience.title: Fine Jewelry CAD Designer
experience.description: Design custom-made fine jewelry in CAD using Matrix 8. Create photo realistic CAD renders for customer approval. Satisfy customer needs and increase sales. Operate Solid-Scape for daily 3D print.

experience.title: Fine Jewelry CAD Designer
experience.description: Design classic fine jewelry in CAD using Matrix 8. Ensure designs can be manufactured; produce water-tight STL files ready for 3D printing.

experience.title: Jewelry Image Retoucher
experience.description: MAC environment; create realistic presentations for fashion and retail-focused catalogs and E-Commerce in a high-paced studio environment.

experience.title: Jewelry Designer
experience.description: Developed new original designs and interfaced with factory production overseas. Specializing in designing fine bridal diamond jewelry for JCPenney, Zales, Macy's, etc.

experience.title: Founder, Jewelry Designer, Retoucher
experience.description: Created original 18K fine jewelry that was carried by Stanley Korshak from 2008 to 2010. Ms. Leah Adler and Ms. Sue Spielberg ordered 18K semi-precious original design earrings after seeing our ad in New Yorker Magazine.

education.degree: Matrix 7.5 Comprehensive CAD/CAM Certificate; GIA Colored Stone Essential Certificate
Associate of Arts in Fine Arts Drawing, Jewelry Technology
Bachelor of Fine Arts and Audio-Visual Editing
